info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24983
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24983
;; flags: qr rd ra ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	3600	IN	TXT	"3|welcome"
www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	3600	IN	TXT	"l|fr"

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4762
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4762
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	3600	IN	MX	1 mx4.mail.ovh.net.
www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	3600	IN	MX	10 mx3.mail.ovh.net.
